content: ohana family crochet pattern -this pattern requires basic amigurumi knowledge and fair isle color chage technique knowledge -this pattern is advanced beginner -this pattern is low sew -this pattern comes with instructions to make stitch lilo angel and scrump -this pattern yields a plushie of approx 6 tall with suggested hook size and yarn type -if you tend to crochet tightly due to the technique used for color changing i suggest you either loosen your gauge or you go up half a hook size you will need dark blue main blue lilac and pale blue for stitch lilac pale pink and pink for angel mint green yellow and pink for scrump red coffee black and teal for lilo
